divs: Sighting Detailswe were driving and it looked like a firework or a shooting star but we knew it wasn't. It went from right to left in the sky above the tree tops but not as far up as the clouds. it didn't go into a cloud but disappeared out of nowhere
Summary: like a shooting star but really low, super bright colors and moving from right to left like a shooting star, then disappeared
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Fenton
There were no other sightings in Fenton on or around June 14th 2012
